reference_summary:
The Good Wife
Drama
['Pushing aside the betrayal and crushing public humiliation caused by her husband, Peter, Alicia Florrick starts over by pursuing her original career as a defense attorney.  As a junior associate at a prestigious Chicago law firm, she joins her longtime friend, former law school classmate and firm partner Will Gardner, who is interested in rekindling their former relationship.']
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rosemary Rodriguez', 'Michael Zinberg', 'Brooke Kennedy', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Jim McKay', 'Frederick E.O. Toye', 'Robert King', 'Matt Shakman', 'Nelson McCormick']}
I just started this series and it it hard to stop watching it!  I love the main character Alicia.  My next  favorite is Zack, her son.  Both of them are so smart and yet, vulnerable.  Strong women will love this.  If you want to be a strong woman you will love it too.  If men would like to be better men, they can pick up a few pointers from this series as well.  Enjoy!
Very good program
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Bobby Quinn'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Carson', 'Ed McMahon', 'Bill Clinton'], 'Studio': ['Respond2 Entertainment']}
Carson was a one of a kind, never to be duplicated.  I use to watch this program with my parents as a child.  Never a dull one.  You will like this video.
Great memories!
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sydney Pollack'], 'Producers': ['Joe Wizan'], 'Starring': ['Robert Redford', 'Will Geer', 'Stefan Gierasch'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
Classic Redford movie.  A must watch for a fan of adventure and Redford.  It is the type of movie you watch several times and always see something new.
Classic!
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Joel Schumacher'], 'Producers': ['Andrew Lloyd Webber'], 'Starring': ['Gerard Butler', 'Emmy Rossum', 'Patrick Wilson'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']}
My granddaughter and I have watched this together many times.  Such a bittersweet love story and beautiful music!  Love it!
Best Musical!
Breaking Bad
Suspense, Drama
['All bad things must come to an end.']
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Michelle MacLaren', 'Mark Johnson', 'Vince Gilligan']}
The first series we have watched entirely.  I had to purchase to finish!  I bought it for my husband really.  Great program but not for children!
The best!
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Rosemary Rodriguez', 'Michael Zinberg', 'Brooke Kennedy', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Jim McKay', 'Frederick E.O. Toye', 'Robert King', 'Matt Shakman', 'Nelson McCormick'], 'Studio': ['CBS']}
I always look forward to my special time watching this series.  The main character, Alicia, is smart, caring, and is wonderfully portrayed.  The supporting characters are all very dynamic and each have their own entertaining aspect.  The female actors in this series are the best I have seen I. A series.  Enjoy!
Excellent!
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kenneth Fink', 'J. What a surprise!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user maintains a strong affinity for drama series with intricate character dynamics and personal growth. They also foster a nostalgic connection to classic films while recently expanding their appreciation for suspenseful narratives and emotionally impactful musicals.

- **Character Focus:** The user is particularly attracted to stories with strong, intelligent female leads and values character development alongside family dynamics. This includes content that is suitable for sharing with grandchildren, highlighting themes of resilience and trust. Their recent viewing choices reflect a nostalgic yearning for innocence.

- **Audience Insight:** The user understands the appeal of empowering narratives that resonate with women and present positive male role models.

- **Emotionally Engaged:** The user seeks narratives that are emotionally charged, emphasizing struggle, strength, and personal growth. Their recent engagement with films indicates a continued preference for deep, insightful storytelling that evokes joy and cherished memories.

- **Viewing Behavior:** They enjoy binge-watching series, with a clear love for quality films and musicals that provide emotional resonance.

- **Social Commentary:** The user appreciates stories that address gender roles and relationships, valuing empowering lessons and family-centric experiences.

Overall, the user remains dedicated to well-crafted dramas, musicals, and suspenseful series, eagerly engaging with content that reflects personal history and profound life lessons, while also invoking nostalgia and trust.
